House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08226
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING AND INSTITUTIONALIZING LONG-TERM CARE FOR SENIOR CITIZENS, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to provide a National Long-Term Care Program Framework for the Senior Citizens that shall endeavor to help them in improving their total well-being and their full participation in society. Intends to grant affordable and quality services to the elderly that will alleviate their difficulties.
